# Merging the ESS

```{r}
ess <- plyr::rbind.fill(ess5_7, ess8)

ess %<>% 
  mutate(cntryname = sjmisc::to_label(cntry)) %>% 
  mutate(cntryear = paste(cntryname, essround, sep = "_"))
```
